title: KIM SWITCH / DAY TWO UNION
description: Kim blinks red when he's joined your team near the stairs. He wants to tell you the vigilantes have showed up and that you should talk to them -- but be careful. (Final warning about RCM non-presence in Martinaise.)

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've got some good news." The lieu..."
dialogueTree.text: "I've got some good news." The lieutenant smiles. "I took care of the body. The thought of him decomposing in my MC wouldn't let me sleep."

links.title: You: ""Good, thanks.""
links.text: "Good, thanks."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm just glad he's gone. We have o..."
links.text: "I'm just glad he's gone. We have other matters to attend to."

links.title: Interfacing: "Oh well -- we'll get the armoured b..."
links.text: Oh well -- we'll get the armoured boots in another lifetime.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm just glad he's gone. We have o..."
links.text: "I'm just glad he's gone. We have other matters to attend to."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The lieutenant is downplaying his c..."
links.text: The lieutenant is downplaying his contribution -- he got up before sunrise to get this done. And now he's quite pleased with himself for taking care of the gruesome business so efficiently.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He points to the mess hall doors. "..."
links.text: He points to the mess hall doors. "The Union muscle finally turned up, and they look rowdy. We need to talk to them."

links.title: You: ""I don't know if I was ready to let..."
links.text: "I don't know if I was ready to let him go..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, he's in processing now. We h..."
links.text: "Well, he's in processing now. We have other matters to attend to."

links.title: Interfacing: "Oh well -- we'll get the armoured b..."
links.text: Oh well -- we'll get the armoured boots in another lifetime.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, he's in processing now. We h..."
links.text: "Well, he's in processing now. We have other matters to attend to."

links.title: Empathy: "He kind of wishes you'd acknowledge..."
links.text: He kind of wishes you'd acknowledged his contribution, but you've missed your opportunity now.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like we can get to work at o..."
dialogueTree.text: "Looks like we can get to work at once. The Union muscle turned up." He points to the mess hall doors. "They look rowdy. We should talk to them."

links.title: Composure: "He won't even *acknowledge* the sto..."
links.text: He won't even *acknowledge* the stolen boots you're wearing. For him, they don't exist. You'll have to bring it up yourself, later -- *if* you dare.

links.title: You: ""Why do we need to talk to them?""
links.text: "Why do we need to talk to them?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is clearly the Union's *peace..."
links.text: "This is clearly the Union's *peacekeeping* force Evrart told us about. The one he said hanged our victim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't be sure of course -- Evra..."
links.text: "We can't be sure of course -- Evrart may have lied to us. He definitely has an agenda of his own. Either way, we need to interview them. And it won't be easy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everything points to the Dockworke..."
links.text: "Everything points to the Dockworkers' Union: the *belt* used for hanging him, the circumstances in Martinaise, my preliminary information..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which may, of course, all be wrong..."
links.text: "Which may, of course, all be wrong. But we still need to talk to them -- and it won't be easy."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everything points to the Dockworke..."
links.text: "Everything points to the Dockworkers' Union: the tracks in the mud, the circumstances in Martinaise, my preliminary information..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A lot of things point to the Dockw..."
links.text: "A lot of things point to the Dockworkers' Union: the circumstances in Martinaise, my preliminary information. Hmm, actually..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...that's not *a lot* of things. W..."
links.text: "...that's not *a lot* of things. We should have dug up more yesterday. Still, we need to talk to them. And it won't be easy."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean 'rowdy'?""
links.text: "What do you mean 'rowdy'?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I mean ungovernable. Martinaise is..."
links.text: "I mean ungovernable. Martinaise isn't exactly enthusiastic about the RCM being here. They prefer to be *policed* by the Union -- these men here..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Men who drink beer for breakfast...."
links.text: "Men who drink beer for breakfast. I have no doubt these are the Hardie boys Evrart told us about, the ones who *keep the peace* around here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And the big one," he squints his e..."
links.text: "And the big one," he squints his eyes, studying the men in the mess hall, "must be Hardie himself..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Men who drink beer for breakfast?..."
links.text: "Men who drink beer for breakfast? There's talk of an armed wing of the Union called *the Hardie boys*, who are responsible for said *policing*. I think it's them."

links.title: You: ""Are these the men Garte told us ab..."
links.text: "Are these the men Garte told us about yesterday?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I completely forgot." He looks at..."
links.text: "I completely forgot." He looks at his notes. "Sorry, I had a rough night's sleep. It's them, by the looks of it -- loud and nasty, just like the manager said."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One loose thread less to worry abo..."
links.text: "One loose thread less to worry about -- and one big problem to replace it." He crosses something out.

links.title: You: ""There are so many of them. Maybe w..."
links.text: "There are so many of them. Maybe we should call in reinforcements?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That would just escalate tensions...."
links.text: "That would just escalate tensions. No captain would sign off on it. Solving one murder isn't worth a conflict between the RCM and the DÃ©bardeurs' Union."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In fact, even the *death* of two d..."
links.text: "In fact, even the *death* of two detectives might not warrant an all-out war. So let's keep a cool head, okay?"

links.title: Half Light: "He's not exaggerating about that mo..."
links.text: He's not exaggerating about that mortal danger. Just calmly factoring it in. Your fists clench and your pulse rises uncomfortably.

links.title: You: ""Let's roll." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Let's roll." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One more thing before we do..." He..."
links.text: "One more thing before we do..." He glances at the booth again. "We don't have to talk to them immediately. We can walk right past them, continue with our business."

links.title: Authority: "Good. A power move. *Purposefully*..."
links.text: Good. A power move. *Purposefully* concentrate on something else first.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Yeah -- streetwise. Zoom right past..."
links.text: Yeah -- streetwise. Zoom right past, do it on your own terms.

links.title: Logic: "But... aren't you *curious* to know..."
links.text: But... aren't you *curious* to know what they have to say about the murder?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They're in no hurry to leave -- th..."
links.text: "They're in no hurry to leave -- they think they own the place... Anyway, I leave that choice to you. Whatever you decide is fine by me."

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like we can get to work at o..."
dialogueTree.text: "Looks like we can get to work at once. The Union muscle turned up." He points to the mess hall doors. "They look rowdy. We should talk to them."
